title: Quitting My Studies, ‘coz I Want to Date! - Novel Updates
tags: Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Modern Day   Smart Couple   Wealthy Characters
author: Hong Ci Bei   红刺北
description:
While forever-No.2 Yao Yi was submitting her homework, she overhead some teachers casually gossiping in the staffroom, about how a student’s academic performance had worsened significantly ever since he started dating.

Yao Yi’s eyes lit up when she heard this, then and there she made up her mind to go approach the form’s No.1 student, date him, and then let him drop rock-bottom in terms of academic performance! This way, she could be the number 1 student in the form.

Much later, still-forever-Number 2 Yao Yi: If I can’t rank first in the form, then I’ll settle for being their person instead>
